title: Replace 'AR' placeholder logo with uploaded Vayutaksha Consultancy logo image

requirements.summary: Replace all 'AR' text placeholder logos throughout the site with the uploaded Vayutaksha Consultancy logo image served as a static frontend asset
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded logo image is saved as frontend/public/assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png and served as a static asset.
The navigation bar no longer shows 'AR' initials or any text-based placeholder; instead it displays the logo image.
The hero section logo mark is replaced with the uploaded image where applicable.
The footer (if it contains the 'AR' mark) is updated to use the image.
All logo image elements have alt='Vayutaksha Consultancy'.
The logo renders at an appropriate size in each location without distortion.

file_operations.description: Save the uploaded Vayutaksha Consultancy logo image as a static frontend asset at this path to be served directly by the frontend without backend routing

Replace the 'AR' text/initials placeholder logo in the navigation bar with an tag referencing /assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png. Set alt='Vayutaksha Consultancy' and size the image to approximately 40-48px height to fit naturally in the navigation context while maintaining aspect ratio

Replace any 'AR' logo mark or text placeholder in the hero section with an tag referencing /assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png. Set alt='Vayutaksha Consultancy' and size the image appropriately for the hero context (larger than nav, specific dimensions to be determined based on current layout)

Replace any 'AR' mark or text placeholder in the footer section with an tag referencing /assets/generated/vayutaksha-logo.png. Set alt='Vayutaksha Consultancy' and size the image to fit naturally in the footer context
